faq.question: Why is there no "Forrest To Do List" so that I can help?

answer.p: Short answer: There is a To Do list. It is inside the file $FORREST_HOME/forrest.xgump

Long answer: The build docs does not yet generate the To Do list or the Changes list, by extracting them from the forrest.xgump file. Please help build the stylesheets and Cocoon sitemap snippet to do that job.

faq.question: Why do the generated documents look a little strange?

answer.p: Because we are in transition to the new document-v11.dtd and there are still some stylesheets that need tweaking. See the Demo document-v11

faq.question: I have checked out a working copy of xml-forrest CVS, now what?

answer.p: Run "build docs" to see the initial documentation for Forrest.

faq.question: I gather that I will be able to use the Forrest infrastructure to build my own website.

answer.p: That is correct. Many of us want to do that, and that is partially why we are working here. Forrest will be designed to not only build websites for the various Apache projects, but also so that you can apply your own skins to your own content.
However, it is not yet ready. So please help us to reach that stage.
